## Feature Description

Clear description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this feature address? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution

How would you implement this feature? Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Use Case

Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be valuable.

**Example:**
- User analyzes Korean tech stocks (e.g., Samsung, SK Hynix)
- Currently: [limitation]
- With this feature: [improvement]

## Implementation Complexity

Your assessment of implementation difficulty:
- [ ] Low - Simple configuration or minor code change
- [ ] Medium - New feature requiring some architectural changes
- [ ] High - Major feature requiring significant refactoring

## Priority

How important is this to you?
- [ ] Critical - Blocking my usage
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement

Which parts of the system does this relate to? (Check all that apply)

- [ ] Memory/ChromaDB
- [ ] Output formatting
- [ ] Performance/cost optimization
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Other: [specify]

Any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request.
